Reason: The configuration option 'memtable_allocation_type' is performance-sensitive. This is because the 'memtable_allocation_type' directly impacts the allocation and management of memtable memory in Cassandra, which is crucial for system performance. Therefore, any changes in 'memtable_allocation_type' can result in notable performance variations at the system level.
